author: Rebecca Ballhaus
title: Trump Organization Says Profits From Foreign Governments Totaled $151,470
text:
The Trump Organization said Friday it donated about $150,000 to the U.S. Treasury last month, an amount the company said represented its 2017 profits from foreign governments.
George Sorial, executive vice president of the Trump Organization, said in a statement the donation was “voluntary” and “fulfills our pledge to donate profits from foreign government patronage at our hotels and similar business during President Trump’s term in office.”
...
